name: Midnight Pong
description:
If the game screen is too big, ensure to zoom out in your browser to see the full window.

A simple re-imagining of pong. When the room goes dark, pay attention to the particles the ball leaves when it bounces off walls and paddles. Also, beware of enemy paddle lasers!

Created in under a week for the #NoticeMe GCX game jam.

Arcade Controls

  • Up: up arrow key
  • Down: down arrow key
  • Pause: P

2 Player Controls

  • Player 1
  • Up: W key
  • Down: S key
  • Player 2
  • Up: up arrow key
  • Down: down arrow key
